text: This is overall a great game. I loved the beta but I feel like this released version has more bugs than the beta did. Things I've come across are the constant lag spikes when driving around, textures inside the dump truck aren't right (sometimes they are pure white) and if you're driving and teleport to another location, it keeps the throttle on and hitting the brake doesn't stop it.   Please fix this game. These bugs are more annoying than any bugs I encountered during the beta tests. I feel like you guys released this too early and never worked out all the major issues. When people are all complaining about the same bugs, you did something wrong.
replyText:
Hi Damien, 
could you please send us your feedback and your mentioned problem via mail to supportcs2@astragon.de so we can have a closer look on that. Thanks!

text: Mine has crashed and won't let me back on
replyText:
